ayah: قُلۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسۡتَمَعَ نَفَرٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا سَمِعۡنَا قُرۡءَانًا عَجَبٗا
ayah_translit: qul uhiya ilayya annahu is'tama'a nafarun mina al-jini faqalu inna sami'na qur'anan ajaban
ayah_english: Say It has been revealed to me that listened a group of the jinn and they said Indeed we heard a Quran amazing

ayah: يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشۡدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ وَلَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدٗا
ayah_translit: yahdi ila al-rush'di faamanna bihi walan nush'rika birabbina ahadan
ayah_english: It guides to the right way so we believe in it and never we will associate with our Lord anyone

ayah: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةٗ وَلَا وَلَدٗا
ayah_translit: wa-annahu ta'ala jaddu rabbina ma ittakhadha sahibatan wala waladan
ayah_english: And that He Exalted is (the) Majesty (of) our Lord not He has taken a wife and not a son

ayah_translit: wa-annahu kana yaqulu safihuna ala al-lahi shatatan

ayah: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمۡ رَهَقٗا
ayah_translit: wa-annahu kana rijalun mina al-insi ya'udhuna birijalin mina al-jini fazaduhum rahaqan
ayah_english: And that (there) were men among mankind who sought refuge in (the) men from the jinn so they increased them (in) burden

ayah: وَأَنَّهُمۡ ظَنُّواْ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن يَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٗا
ayah_translit: wa-annahum zannu kama zanantum an lan yab'atha al-lahu ahadan
ayah_english: And that they thought as you thought that never will raise Allah anyone

ayah: وَأَنَّا لَمَسۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدۡنَٰهَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَسٗا شَدِيدٗا وَشُهُبٗا
ayah_translit: wa-anna lamasna al-samaa fawajadnaha muli-at harasan shadidan washuhuban
ayah_english: And that we sought to touch the heaven but we found it filled (with) guards severe and flaming fires

ayah: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقۡعُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَٰعِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِۖ فَمَن يَسۡتَمِعِ ٱلۡأٓنَ يَجِدۡ لَهُۥ شِهَابٗا رَّصَدٗا
ayah_translit: wa-anna kunna naq'udu min'ha maqa'ida lilssam'i faman yastami'i al-ana yajid lahu shihaban rasadan
ayah_english: And that we used (to) sit there in positions for hearing but (he) who listens now will find for him a flaming fire waiting

ayah: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدۡرِيٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ أَرَادَ بِهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ رَشَدٗا
ayah_translit: wa-anna la nadri asharrun urida biman fi al-ardi am arada bihim rabbuhum rashadan
ayah_english: And that we not we know whether evil is intended for (those) who (are) in the earth or intends for them their Lord a right path

ayah: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدۡرِيٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ أَرَادَ بِهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ رَشَدٗا

ayah: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدٗا
ayah_translit: wa-anna minna al-salihuna waminna duna dhalika kunna taraiqa qidadan

ayah: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعۡجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَن نُّعۡجِزَهُۥ هَرَبٗا
ayah_translit: wa-anna zananna an lan nu'jiza al-laha fi al-ardi walan nu'jizahu haraban
ayah_english: And that we [we] have become certain that never we will cause failure (to) Allah in the earth and never we can escape Him (by) flight

ayah: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعۡجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَن نُّعۡجِزَهُۥ هَرَبٗا

ayah: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخۡسٗا وَلَا رَهَقٗا
ayah_translit: wa-anna lamma sami'na al-huda amanna bihi faman yu'min birabbihi fala yakhafu bakhsan wala rahaqan
ayah_english: And that when we heard the Guidance we believed in it And whoever believes in his Lord then not he will fear any loss and not any burden

ayah: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخۡسٗا وَلَا رَهَقٗا
ayah_translit: wa-anna lamma sami'na al-huda amanna bihi faman yu'min birabbihi fala yakhafu bakhsan wala rahaqan

ayah: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلۡمُسۡلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلۡقَٰسِطُونَۖ فَمَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوۡاْ رَشَدٗا
ayah_translit: wa-anna minna al-mus'limuna waminna al-qasituna faman aslama fa-ulaika taharraw rashadan
ayah_english: And that we among us (are) Muslims and among us (are) unjust And whoever submits then those have sought (the) right path

ayah: لِّنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِيهِۚ وَمَن يُعۡرِضۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسۡلُكۡهُ عَذَابٗا صَعَدٗا
ayah_translit: linaftinahum fihi waman yu'rid an dhik'ri rabbihi yasluk'hu adhaban sa'adan
ayah_english: That We might test them therein And whoever turns away from the Remembrance (of) his Lord He will make him enter a punishment severe

ayah_translit: wa-annahu lamma qama abdu al-lahi yad'uhu kadu yakununa alayhi libadan

ayah_english: And that when stood up (the) slave (of) Allah calling (upon) Him they almost became around him a compacted mass

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا
ayah_translit: qul innama ad'u rabbi wala ush'riku bihi ahadan
ayah_english: Say Only I call upon my Lord and not I associate with Him anyone

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

ayah: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا رَشَدٗا
ayah_translit: qul inni la amliku lakum darran wala rashadan
ayah_english: Say Indeed I (do) not possess for you any harm and not right path

ayah: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٞ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا
ayah_translit: qul inni lan yujirani mina al-lahi ahadun walan ajida min dunihi mul'tahadan
ayah_english: Say Indeed I never can protect me from Allah anyone and never can I find from besides Him any refuge

ayah: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٞ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا

ayah: إِلَّا بَلَٰغٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَٰلَٰتِهِۦۚ وَمَن يَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا
ayah_translit: illa balaghan mina al-lahi warisalatihi waman ya'si al-laha warasulahu fa-inna lahu nara jahannama khalidina fiha abadan
ayah_english: But (the) notification from Allah and His Messages And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger then indeed for him (is the) Fire (of) Hell (they will) abide therein forever

ayah: إِلَّا بَلَٰغٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَٰلَٰتِهِۦۚ وَمَن يَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوۡاْ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَضۡعَفُ نَاصِرٗا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدٗا
ayah_translit: hatta idha ra-aw ma yu'aduna fasaya'lamuna man ad'afu nasiran wa-aqallu adadan
ayah_english: Until when they see what they are promised then they will know who (is) weaker (in) helpers and fewer (in) number

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوۡاْ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَضۡعَفُ نَاصِرٗا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدٗا

ayah: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ يَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَمَدًا
ayah_translit: qul in adri aqaribun ma tu'aduna am yaj'alu lahu rabbi amadan
ayah_english: Say Not I know whether is near what you are promised or (whether) will appoint for it my Lord a (distant) term

ayah: عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ فَلَا يُظۡهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيۡبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
ayah_translit: alimu al-ghaybi fala yuz'hiru ala ghaybihi ahadan
ayah_english: (The) All-Knower (of) the unseen so not He reveals from His unseen (to) anyone

ayah: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٖ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسۡلُكُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦ رَصَدٗا
ayah_translit: illa mani ir'tada min rasulin fa-innahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi rasadan
ayah_english: Except whom He has approved of a Messenger and indeed, He makes to march from before him and from behind him a guard

ayah: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٖ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسۡلُكُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦ رَصَدٗا
ayah_translit: illa mani ir'tada min rasulin fa-innahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi rasadan
ayah_english: Except whom He has approved of a Messenger and indeed, He makes to march from before him and from behind him a guard

ayah: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٖ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسۡلُكُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦ رَصَدٗا
ayah_translit: illa mani ir'tada min rasulin fa-innahu yasluku min bayni yadayhi wamin khalfihi rasadan
ayah_english: Except whom He has approved of a Messenger and indeed, He makes to march from before him and from behind him a guard

ayah: لِّيَعۡلَمَ أَن قَدۡ أَبۡلَغُواْ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ وَأَحۡصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عَدَدَۢا
ayah_translit: liya'lama an qad ablaghu risalati rabbihim wa-ahata bima ladayhim wa-ahsa kulla shayin adadan
ayah_english: That He may make evident that indeed they have conveyed (the) Messages (of) their Lord; and He has encompassed what (is) with them and He takes account (of) all things (in) number
